dropping the orb in the sarcophagus with a window to see what happens

the storm that made El an orphan
speaking the language of my worst enemies

as many pastries as the party can carry
getting out of town real quick

shutting your eyes and walking down the stairs

wanting my deity to step on me
accidentally becoming the villain of the game

walking through town with manticore wings

hiding from the cops while your friends hide from the mob

consistantly running out of words in your sending spell
owing a favor to the thieves' guild

harvesting miscellaneous bits from the monsters you slay

a non-sexual, but exquisitely performed, dance routine
